response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique chance to secure an asset valued at $1,200,000 for a highly competitive rate. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
